repository-info.name: github
repository-info.description: Misc GitHub repos with sources for STM32

module.name: robots
module.description: Various Cortex-M3 projects

module.name: roboterclubaachen_xpcc
module.description: The C++ microcontroller framework xpcc for AVR and Cortex-M

module.name: majerle_keil
module.description: MaJerle - Keil projects and libraries for STM32F4xx devices

module.name: majerle_easy_gui
module.description: MaJerle/EasyGUI - Easy GUI for microcontrollers

module.name: arduino_stm
module.description: Arduino for STM32 - Generic implementation of Arduino for STM32 boards - https://danieleff.github.io/STM32GENERIC/

module.name: stm32duino
module.description: stm32duino/Arduino_Core_STM32 - STM32 core support for Arduino

module.name: redbear_arduino
module.description: redbear/STM32-Arduino - Use Arduino IDE to develop STM32 MCU (e.g. RedBear Duo) firmware.

module.name: contiki_sensor
module.description: STM32-Contiki_Sensor_Smart_Home

module.name: istarc_stm32_samples
module.description: istarc/stm32 - STM32F4 Discovery Board Examples - https://istarc.wordpress.com/

module.name: bosch_ros
module.description: bosch-ros-pkg - A lightweight implementation of the ROS middleware on STM32F4Discovery for interfacing embedded and general-purpose software.

module.name: meegoo_tsui
module.description: meegoo-tsui/stm32

module.name: libusb_stm32
module.description: Lightweight USB device Stack for STM32 microcontrollers

module.name: umbrela_smart_android_stm32_dfu
module.description: UmbrelaSmart/android-stm32-dfu-programmer -

module.name: juma_io_stm32
module.description: A STM32_Platform to to facilitate development work for BLE(BlueNRG-MS) applications.

module.name: armink_free_modbus
module.description: armink / FreeModbus_Slave -Master -RTT-STM32

module.name: gk969_speech_recognition
module.description: gk969/stm32-speech-recognition

module.name: maker_labme_marlin
module.description: MakerLabMe/Marlin_STM32 - 3d printer Marlin firmware for 32 bit arm cpu STM32F10X

module.name: meekdai_stm32_grbl
module.description: Meekdai/STM32-GRBL - STM32 CNC Controller

module.name: rurume_bootloader
module.description: rurume/STM32-Bootloader - This project is an example of IAP Bootloader with UART. Now is using in stm32f107vct6 chip and Keil MDK-Arm uvision5.

module.name: stm_sdr
module.description: STM32-SDR/STM32-SDR - Software Defined Radio running on STM32 processor.

module.name: andysworkshop_stm32plus
module.description: andysworkshop/stm32plus - The C++ library for the STM32 F0, F100, F103, F107 and F4 microcontrollers

module.name: akospasztor_bootloader
module.description: akospasztor/stm32-bootloader - Customizable Bootloader for STM32 microcontrollers. This example demonstrates how to perform in-application-programming of a firmware located on an external SD card with FAT32 file system.

module.name: dccharacter_servo_controller
module.description: dccharacter/STM32_Servo_Controller - STM32-based servo/CNC/3D-printer controller
